00037 #define DEFAULT_VLAN          1
00038 #define MAX_DIGITS_IN_CHOICE  5

00040 /*****************************************************************/
00048 int example_port_default_config(int unit)
00049 {
00050   opennsl_port_config_t pcfg;
00051   opennsl_port_info_t info;
00052   int rv;
00053   int port;
00054   int stp_state = OPENNSL_STG_STP_FORWARD;
00055   int stg = 1;
00056 
00057   /*
00058    * Create VLAN with id DEFAULT_VLAN and
00059    * add ethernet ports to the VLAN
00060    */
00061   rv = opennsl_port_config_get(unit, &pcfg);
00062   if (rv != OPENNSL_E_NONE) 
00063   {
00064     printf("Failed to get port configuration. Error %s\n", opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00065     return rv;
00066   }
00067 
00068   /* Set the STP state to forward in default STG for all ports */
00069   OPENNSL_PBMP_ITER(pcfg.e, port)
00070   {
00071     rv = opennsl_stg_stp_set(unit, stg, port, stp_state);
00072     if (rv != OPENNSL_E_NONE) 
00073     {
00074       printf("Failed to set STP state for unit %d port %d, Error %s\n",
00075           unit, port, opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00076       return rv;
00077     }
00078   }
00079 
00080   /* Setup default configuration on the ports */
00081   opennsl_port_info_t_init(&info);
00082 
00083   info.speed        = 0;
00084   info.duplex       = OPENNSL_PORT_DUPLEX_FULL;
00085   info.pause_rx     = OPENNSL_PORT_ABILITY_PAUSE_RX;
00086   info.pause_tx     = OPENNSL_PORT_ABILITY_PAUSE_TX;
00087   info.linkscan     = OPENNSL_LINKSCAN_MODE_SW;
00088   info.autoneg      = FALSE;
00089   info.enable = 1;
00090 
00091   info.action_mask |= ( OPENNSL_PORT_ATTR_AUTONEG_MASK |
00092       OPENNSL_PORT_ATTR_SPEED_MASK    |
00093       OPENNSL_PORT_ATTR_DUPLEX_MASK   |
00094       OPENNSL_PORT_ATTR_PAUSE_RX_MASK |
00095       OPENNSL_PORT_ATTR_PAUSE_TX_MASK |
00096       OPENNSL_PORT_ATTR_LINKSCAN_MASK |
00097       OPENNSL_PORT_ATTR_ENABLE_MASK   );
00098 
00099   OPENNSL_PBMP_ITER(pcfg.e, port)
00100   {
00101     rv = opennsl_port_selective_set(unit, port, &info);
00102     if (OPENNSL_FAILURE(rv)) 
00103     {
00104       printf("Failed to set port config for unit %d, port %d, Error %s",
00105           unit, port, opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00106       return rv;
00107     }
00108   }
00109 
00110   return OPENNSL_E_NONE;
00111 }
00112 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */

00114 /*****************************************************************/
00121 int example_switch_default_vlan_config(int unit)
00122 {
00123   opennsl_port_config_t pcfg;
00124   int rv;
00125 
00126   /*
00127    * Create VLAN with id DEFAULT_VLAN and
00128    * add ethernet ports to the VLAN
00129    */
00130   rv = opennsl_port_config_get(unit, &pcfg);
00131   if (rv != OPENNSL_E_NONE) {
00132     printf("Failed to get port configuration. Error %s\n", opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00133     return rv;
00134   }
00135 
00136   rv = opennsl_vlan_port_add(unit, DEFAULT_VLAN, pcfg.e, pcfg.e);
00137   if (rv != OPENNSL_E_NONE) {
00138     printf("Failed to add ports to VLAN. Error %s\n", opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00139     return rv;
00140   }
00141 
00142   return OPENNSL_E_NONE;
00143 }
00144 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */

00146 /**************************************************************************/
00154 char *example_read_user_string(char *buf, size_t buflen)
00155 {
00156   int ch;
00157 
00158   if (fgets(buf, buflen, stdin) != 0)
00159   {
00160     size_t len = strlen(buf);
00161     if (len > 0 && buf[len-1] == '\n')
00162     {
00163       buf[len-1] = '\0';
00164     }
00165     else
00166     {
00167       while ((ch = getc(stdin)) != EOF && ch != '\n');
00168     }
00169     return buf;
00170   }
00171   return 0;
00172 }
00173 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00174 /**************************************************************************/
00181 int example_read_user_choice(int *choice)
00182 {
00183   char val;
00184   char digits[MAX_DIGITS_IN_CHOICE + 1];
00185   int idx = 0;
00186   int valid = TRUE;
00187 
00188   /* parse input string until \n */
00189   while((val = getchar()) != '\n')
00190   {
00191     if ((val >= '0' && val <= '9') && idx < MAX_DIGITS_IN_CHOICE)
00192     {
00193       digits[idx++] = val;
00194     }
00195     else
00196     {
00197       valid = FALSE;
00198     }
00199   }
00200   if ((valid == TRUE) && idx != 0)
00201   {
00202     digits[idx] = '\0';
00203     *choice = atoi(digits);
00204     return(OPENNSL_E_NONE);
00205   }
00206   else
00207   {
00208     *choice = -1;
00209     return(OPENNSL_E_FAIL);
00210   }
00211 }
00212 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00213 
00214 /*****************************************************************/
00222 int opennsl_mac_parse(char *buf, unsigned char *macp)
00223 {
00224   int   i, c1, c2;
00225   char  *s;
00226 #define MAC_ADDR_LEN 17
00227 
00228   macp[0] = macp[1] = macp[2] = 0;
00229   macp[3] = macp[4] = macp[5] = 0;
00230 
00231   if ((buf == NULL) || (strlen(buf) > MAC_ADDR_LEN)) {
00232     return OPENNSL_E_FAIL;
00233   }
00234 
00235   /* skip leading 0x if plain hex format */
00236   if (buf[0] == '0' && (buf[1] == 'x' || buf[1] == 'X')) {
00237     buf += 2;
00238   }
00239 
00240   /* start at end of string and work backwards */
00241   for (s = buf; *s; s++) {
00242     ;
00243   }
00244   for (i = 5; i >= 0 && s >= buf; i--) {
00245     c1 = c2 = 0;
00246     if (--s >= buf) {
00247       if (*s >= '0' && *s <= '9') {
00248         c2 = *s - '0';
00249       } else if (*s >= 'a' && *s <= 'f') {
00250         c2 = *s - 'a' + 10;
00251       } else if (*s >= 'A' && *s <= 'F') {
00252         c2 = *s - 'A' + 10;
00253       } else if (*s == ':') {
00254         ;
00255       } else {
00256         return OPENNSL_E_FAIL;
00257       }
00258     }
00259     if (*s != ':' && --s >= buf) {
00260       if (*s >= '0' && *s <= '9') {
00261         c1 = *s - '0';
00262       } else if (*s >= 'a' && *s <= 'f') {
00263         c1 = *s - 'a' + 10;
00264       } else if (*s >= 'A' && *s <= 'F') {
00265         c1 = *s - 'A' + 10;
00266       } else if (*s == ':') {
00267         ;
00268       } else {
00269         return OPENNSL_E_FAIL;
00270       }
00271     }
00272 
00273     if (s > buf && s[-1] == ':') {
00274       --s;
00275     }
00276     macp[i] = c1 << 4 | c2;
00277   }
00278   return OPENNSL_E_NONE;
00279 }
00280 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */

00282 /*****************************************************************/
00287 void l2_print_mac(char *str, opennsl_mac_t mac_address){
00288   unsigned int a,b,c,d,e,f;
00289   a = 0xff & mac_address[0];
00290   b = 0xff & mac_address[1];
00291   c = 0xff & mac_address[2];
00292   d = 0xff & mac_address[3];
00293   e = 0xff & mac_address[4];
00294   f = 0xff & mac_address[5];
00295   printf("%s %02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x:%02x",
00296       str,
00297       a,b,c,
00298       d,e,f);
00299   return;
00300 }
00301 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00302 
00303 /*****************************************************************/
00311 int opennsl_ip_parse(char *ip_str, unsigned int *ip_val)
00312 {
00313   unsigned int num = 0, val;
00314   char *tok;
00315   int count = 0;
00316   char buf[16]; /* Maximum length of IP address in dotten notation */
00317 
00318   if((ip_str == NULL) || (ip_val == NULL) || (strlen(ip_str) > 16))
00319   {
00320     return -1;
00321   }
00322   strcpy(buf, ip_str);
00323   tok = strtok(buf, ".");
00324   while(tok != NULL)
00325   {
00326     count++;
00327     val = atoi(tok);
00328     if((val < 0) || (val > 0xff))
00329     {
00330       return -1;
00331     }
00332     num = (num << 8) + val;
00333     tok = strtok(NULL, ".");
00334   }
00335   if(count != 4)
00336   {
00337     return -1;
00338   }
00339   *ip_val = num;
00340 
00341   return 0;
00342 }
00343 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00344 
00345 /**************************************************************************/
00354 void print_ip_addr(char *str, unsigned int host)
00355 {
00356   int a,b,c,d;
00357 
00358   a = (host >> 24) & 0xff;
00359   b = (host >> 16) & 0xff;
00360   c = (host >> 8 ) & 0xff;
00361   d = host & 0xff;
00362   printf("%s %d.%d.%d.%d", str, a,b,c,d);
00363 }
00364 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00365 
00366 /**************************************************************************/
00375 int opennsl_ctoi(const char *s, char **end)
00376 {
00377   unsigned int  n, neg;
00378   int base = 10;
00379 
00380   if (s == 0) {
00381     if (end != 0) {
00382       end = 0;
00383     }
00384     return 0;
00385   }
00386 
00387   s += (neg = (*s == '-'));
00388 
00389   if (*s == '0') {
00390     s++;
00391     if (*s == 'x' || *s == 'X') {
00392       base = 16;
00393       s++;
00394     } else if (*s == 'b' || *s == 'B') {
00395       base = 2;
00396       s++;
00397     } else {
00398       base = 8;
00399     }
00400   }
00401 
00402   for (n = 0; ((*s >= 'a' && *s < 'a' + base - 10) ||
00403         (*s >= 'A' && *s < 'A' + base - 10) ||
00404         (*s >= '0' && *s <= '9')); s++) {
00405     n = n * base + ((*s <= '9' ? *s : *s + 9) & 15);
00406   }
00407 
00408   if (end != 0) {
00409     *end = (char *) s;
00410   }
00411 
00412   return (int) (neg ? -n : n);
00413 }
00414 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00415 
00416 /**************************************************************************/
00424 int example_max_port_count_get(int unit, int *count)
00425 {
00426   int rc;
00427   opennsl_port_config_t pcfg;
00428   int num_ports;
00429   int num_front_panel_ports;
00430 
00431   rc = opennsl_port_config_get(unit, &pcfg);
00432   if (rc != OPENNSL_E_NONE) {
00433     printf("Failed to get port configuration. Error %s\n", opennsl_errmsg(rc));
00434     return rc;
00435   }
00436 
00437   OPENNSL_PBMP_COUNT(pcfg.ge, num_ports);
00438   num_front_panel_ports = num_ports;
00439   OPENNSL_PBMP_COUNT(pcfg.xe, num_ports);
00440   num_front_panel_ports += num_ports;
00441 
00442   *count = num_front_panel_ports;
00443   return rc;
00444 }
00445 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
